#include <bits/stdc++.h>

typedef long long ll;
using namespace std;


#define MOD 1000000007
ll ModPow(ll a,ll x,ll p)
{
    ll res=1;
    while(x>0)
    {
        if(x%2!=0)
            res=(res*a)%p;
        a=(a*a)%p;
        x/=2;
    }
    return (res%p);
}

int main()
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL);
    int t;
    ll n,m,temp;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n>>m;
        if(n==1) cout<<m<<"\n";
        else if(n==2)
        {
            cout<<m*(m-1)<<"\n";
        }
        else
        {
            if(m<=2) cout<<"0\n";
            else
            {
                temp = ModPow(m-2, n-2, MOD);
                temp = (temp*m)%MOD;
                temp = (temp*(m-1))%MOD;
                cout<<temp<<"\n";
            }
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
